name: Recovery (cardvark61)
description:
Explore the ruins of an ancient group and search for an ancient weapon

Arrow keys to walk/aim/crouch

Z to jump

X to shoot

Press the DOWN arrow while in front of save stations to save (They have an icon of a down arrow and will release a black effect when you successfully save. One of them is in the second screenshot.)

Press P to pause

Press R to take damage and reset your position if you get softlocked

Graphics were from:

Limofeus (explosion effect for defeating mechs and fire effect after defeating mechs)

Abdulla Almheiri (laser effect)

ansimuz (everything else)

Known Bugs:

-The camera can be shaky at times

-Some breakable walls can be broken from the front

-Having multiple dying mechs on-screen at the same time will prevent them from being de-spawned. When this happens, the mech will stay on screen but not move/attack

Tips/Stuff that isn't clear in the game:

-Compared to other weapons, the default laser beam does less damage to mechs

-If you notice a shaking black box, shoot it to open up new paths
